casebody.data:
Brodus and Aura PARHAM, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Sherry Johanne EDWARDS and Marvin E. Turner, Defendants-Appellees. No. 72-3001

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Jan. 16, 1973. J. S. Hutto, Brunswick, Ga., for plaintiffs-appellants. Anthony D. Smith, Albert Fendig, Jr., Brunswick, Ga., for defendants-appellees.

Before GEWIN, AINSWORTH and SIMPSON, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

For reasons sufficiently stated by the District Court, 346 F.Supp. 968 (S.D.Georgia 1972), the judgment is affirmed.
